objects.description: [Shamoon](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0140) accesses network share(s), enables share access to the target device, copies an executable payload to the target system, and uses a [Scheduled Task/Job](https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1053) to execute the malware.(Citation: FireEye Shamoon Nov 2016)

external_references.description: FireEye. (2016, November 30). FireEye Responds to Wave of Destructive Cyber Attacks in Gulf Region. Retrieved January 11, 2017.
